mapper.select: SELECT * FROM custcheck WHERE cust_id = #{custId} AND check_end IS NULL ORDER BY check_no DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE custcheck AS main JOIN ( SELECT check_no FROM custcheck WHERE cust_id = #{custId} AND check_end IS NULL ORDER BY check_start DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS sub ON main.check_no = sub.check_no SET main.check_end = #{checkEnd}
